      private java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,​Communication> GoNatureClient.awaitingRequests

    • Uses of Communication in serverSide.jdbc

      Methods in serverSide.jdbc with parameters of type Communication 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean DatabaseController.executeDeleteQuery​(Communication request)
      Gets a communication request (of a DELETE query), executes the query and returns a boolean value representing the result of the deletion
      boolean DatabaseController.executeInsertQuery​(Communication request)
      Gets a communication request (of an INSERT query), executes the query and returns a boolean value representing the result of the insertion
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object[]> DatabaseController.executeSelectQuery​(Communication request)
      Gets a communication request (of a SELECT query), executes the query and returns an ArrayList representing the ResultSet
      boolean DatabaseController.executeTransaction​(Communication transaction)
      This method gets an array list of communication requets.
      boolean DatabaseController.executeUpdateQuery​(Communication request)
      Gets a communication request (of an UPDATE query), executes the query and returns a boolean value representing the result of the update
